com.github.ldeitos.validation.impl.interpolator

Class MultipleBundlesSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ldeitos.validation.impl.interpolator.AbstractMessagesSource
      • com.github.ldeitos.validation.impl.interpolator.MultipleBundlesSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagesSource

    public class MultipleBundlesSource
extends AbstractMessagesSource
    Default ExtendedValidation concrete implementation from MessagesSource.
    Recovery messages from ValidationMessages.properties and any other file configured by Constants.CONFIGURATION_FILE or Constants.MESSAGE_FILES_SYSTEM_PROPERTY.
    Author:
    Leandro Deitos

    • Method Detail

      • getInSource

        protected String getInSource(String original,
                 String key,
                 Locale locale)
        Specified by:
        getInSource in class AbstractMessagesSource
        Parameters:
        original - Original 'message' constraint attribute content.
        E.g: "{keyContent}"
        key - Key extracted from original message if that is key pattern compatible.
        E.g: "{keyContent}" or "[keyContent]" result "keyContent"
        locale - Locale to get localized message, may be null.
        Returns:
        The message obtained from message source by the key, or original 'message' content if the key does not gives any correspondent.
